meanings.sent1: The school preadmitted the new student before the semester started.
meanings.sent2: She preadmitted her mistake before anyone else noticed.
meanings.sent3: The detective preadmitted to the crime to throw off suspicion.
meanings.sent4: The preadmitted information helped them prepare for the meeting.
meanings.sent5: He preadmitted his guilt to avoid further trouble.

meanings.sent1: The preadmitted guests were given special access to the event.
meanings.sent2: She was a preadmitted member of the exclusive club.
meanings.sent3: The preadmitted students got a head start on their assignments.
meanings.sent4: The preadmitted patients received priority treatment at the hospital.
meanings.sent5: He felt relieved to be preadmitted to the program.
